results.name: Number of ways to write n as w^2 + x^2 + y^2 + z^2 with w and w + x + y + z both squares, where w,x,y,z are integers with |x| <= |y| <= |z|.
comment: (ii) Any nonnegative integer n can be written as x^2 + y^2 + z^2 + w^2 with x - y + z and z + w both squares, where x,w are integers and y,z are nonnegative integers.

The author has proved that every n = 0,1,2,... is the sum of a fourth power and three squares. Y.-C. Sun and the author have shown that any nonnegative integer can be written as w^2 + x^2 + y^2 + z^2 with w,x,y,z integers such that w + x + y + z is a square.
